newsitem.title: HUNGARY: KEY DATES IN ESCALATING GANGLAND WAR.
newsitem.headline: KEY DATES IN ESCALATING GANGLAND WAR.

text.p: Following are key dates in an escalating gangland war in Hungary, in which the latest attack was a hand grenade bombing of a car dealer on Tuesday in Budapest.
Oct 15 - Pipe bomb in Veszprem parking lot causes extensive damage. Police say there have been 13 explosions so far in 1996, compared to 28 blasts in the preceding seven years.
Oct 26 - Luxury car of gambling machine operator damaged by hand grenade.
Oct 28 - Grenade attacks on car showroom and pizza restaurant - material damage.
Oct 30, 1996 - Hand grenade outside White Horse night club causes minor damage.
Nov 1 - Known gangland figure Jozsef Prisztas shot dead in his jeep.
Nov 13 - Jockey Csaba Lakatos seriously wounded in gun attack at racecourse.
Nov 13 - Hand grenade outside LeRoy Country pub.
Nov 15 - Two men held in possession of 1,000 rounds of ammo, seven hand grenades and 2.5 kg of plastic explosive.
Nov 16 - Hand grenade outside Budapest sex club causes some damage.
Nov 21 - Businessman seriously injured in gun attack.
Nov 26 - Another businessman seriously injured in gun attack.
Nov 28 - Two men arrested for possession of 28 hand grenades.
Nov 29 - Budapest casino owner attacked with gun and beaten suffers minor injuries.
Nov 29 - National and Budapest police chiefs sacked.
Dec 4 - Bomb explodes outside downtown Budapest massage parlour, minor damage.
Dec 31 - Shoulder-launched anti-tank grenade shot at night club causes only minor damage as it is equipped with dummy head.
Jan 17 - Hand grenade explodes in yard of Budapest businessman, causing minimal damage.
Jan 27 - Hand grenade explodes at dealership, damages cars.
Jan 29 - Grenade explodes in car dealership, damages cars.
Jan 29 - Suspects held in Oct 26 grenade attack on luxury car.
Jan 31 - Grenade explodes in Great Wall Chinese restaurant's toilet, kills owner's wife and daughter.
Feb 3 - Restaurant set ablaze by petrol bomb.
Feb 4 - Hand grenade damages cars at luxury dealership.
